name: Congregation
flavor: You focus your allies' wrath on a chosen foe.

metadata.flavor: You focus your allies' wrath on a chosen foe.

effects.tier1: 8 + M damage; as a free triggered action, one ally within 10 squares of the target can use a strike signature ability against the target
effects.tier2: 12 + M damage; as a free triggered action, one ally within 10 squares of the target can use a strike signature ability that gains an edge against the target
effects.tier3: 16 + M damage; as a free triggered action, two allies within 10 squares of the target can each use a strike signature ability that gains an edge against the target

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each ally can shift up to 2 squares and gains 2 surges before making the strike.
